pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Akita HTTP Archive (HAR) UtilityThis package provides Pydantic models for HTTP Archive (HAR) files, along witha thread-safe file-writer for creating and concurrently writing HAR entries.## See it in ActionTake a look at the [Akita DjangoIntegration](https://github.com/akitasoftware/akita-django), which extends the`django.test.Client` to produce a HAR file containing requests and responsesfrom Django integration tests.
